exceptions.tactic: assert (H1 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec P (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (nf a P)).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : poly A0 eqA ltM P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) The term "nf a P" has type "poly A0 eqA ltM" while it is expected to have type "list (Term A n)".

In environment A : Set A0 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop p : poly A0 eqA ltM -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> poly A0 eqA ltM X : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), poly A0 eqA ltM -> list (Term A n) A1 : A plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} a : poly A0 eqA ltM P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H0 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec P (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM (p a P)) (pO A n) H1 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec P (pO A n) M1_min : forall x : mon n, ltM x (zero_mon n) -> False ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ltM x x -> False ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) A1_diff_A0 : eqA A1 A0 -> False eqA_ref : reflexive A eqA eqA_sym : symmetric A eqA eqA_trans : transitive A eqA plusA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA a (plusA b c)) (plusA (plusA a b) c) plusA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (plusA a b) (plusA b a) plusA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (plusA a b) (plusA c d) plusA_A0 : forall a : A, eqA a (plusA a A0) invA_plusA : forall a : A, eqA A0 (plusA a (invA a)) invA_eqA_comp : forall a b : A, eqA a b -> eqA (invA a) (invA b) minusA_def : forall a b : A, eqA (minusA a b) (plusA a (invA b)) multA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (multA a b) (multA c d) multA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (multA a (multA b c)) (multA (multA a b) c) multA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) (multA b a) multA_dist_l : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA (multA c a) (multA c b)) (multA c (plusA a b)) multA_A0_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A0 a) A0 multA_A1_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A1 a) a divA_rew : forall (a b : A) (nZ1 nZ2 : eqA b A0 -> False), divA a b nZ1 = divA a b nZ2 divA_is_multA : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b) divA_eqA_comp : forall (a b c d : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZd : eqA d A0 -> False), eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (divA a b nZb) (divA c d nZd) divA_multA_comp_r : forall (a b c : A) (nZc : eqA c A0 -> False), eqA (divA (multA a b) c nZc) (multA (divA a c nZc) b) divA_invA_r : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZib : eqA (invA b) A0 -> False), eqA (divA a (invA b) nZib) (invA (divA a b nZb)) Unable to unify "ReduStarConfluent A A0 ?M4997 eqA ?M5000 ?M5001 ?M5002 ?M5003 ?M5005 n ltM ?M5008 P (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a)" with "let (x, x0) := p a P in match x as l return (canonical A0 eqA ltM l -> Prop) with | nil => fun _ : canonical A0 eqA ltM nil => True | a :: l => fun _ : canonical A0 eqA ltM (a :: l) => False end x0".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (a : poly A0 eqA ltM) (P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), red (nf a P) P -> zerop (nf a P)

Premises:
zerop = fun H' : poly A0 eqA ltM => let (x, x0) := H' in match x as l return (canonical A0 eqA ltM l -> Prop) with | nil => fun _ : canonical A0 eqA ltM nil => True | a :: l => fun _ : canonical A0 eqA ltM (a :: l) => False end x0 : poly A0 eqA ltM -> Prop
poly : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> Set
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
red = fun (a : poly A0 eqA ltM) (P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) => reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec P (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (pO A n) : poly A0 eqA ltM -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Prop Arguments red _ _%list_scope
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
nf = fun (p : poly A0 eqA ltM) (L : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) => let (x, _) := Reducef A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os L p in LetP (poly A0 eqA ltM) (poly A0 eqA ltM) x (fun (u : poly A0 eqA ltM) (_ : u = x) => let (x0, H'2) := u in exist (fun a : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM a) (mults multA (n:=n) (unit (mks A A0 eq
CombLinear_incl : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q a
CombLinear_trans_cons_lem : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q a
reduceplus_cb1 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (a :: Q) b
reduce_cb1 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (a :: Q) b
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
reduce_cb2 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (b :: Q) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a)
reducestar_cb2 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (b :: Q) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a)
reduceplus_cb2 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (b :: Q) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a)
reduceplus_cb2_lem : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (x :: Q) a
reduceplus_cb1_lem : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (x :: Q) b
reduceplus_cb : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q b
reducestar_cb : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q b
ConfluentReduce_ind : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (P : Prop), ((forall p : list (Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> ReduStarConfluent A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA...
Reducef : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p : poly A0 eqA ltM), {q : poly A0 eqA ltM | reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM p) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM q)}
confl_restar : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall p : poly A0 eqA ltM, ReduStarConfluent A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM p)
nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
ConfluentReduce_imp_Grobner : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> Grobner A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q
spolyf_pO : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall (a : list (Term A n)) (Ca : canonical A0 eqA ltM a), eqP A eqA n (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a a Ca Ca) (pO A n)
reducestar_in_pO : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (pO A n)
canonical_spminusf : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p q)
CombLinear_canonical : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM p
CombLinear_mults1 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p)

original: intros a P. assert (H1 : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec P (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (nf a P)). { apply confl_restar with (Q:=P) (p:=a); auto. } assert (H2 : CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec P (nf a P)). { eapply reduce_cb2; eauto. } assert (H3 : canonical A0 eqA ltM (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM (nf a P))). { eapply CombLinear_canonical; eauto. } assert (H4 : zerop (nf a P)). { eapply H3; auto. } apply H4.
